metadata.title: Pure Love Mini Bullet Vibrator, Rechargeable, Travel Size, Adult Sex Toy, Pink Color
features: QUIET YET POWERFUL - The superior Powerbullet motor packs a punch but remains whisper quiet while producing a deep Rumble and reaching new levels of strength and intensity.
AFFORDABLE PRICE - Enjoy all the benefits of a luxury pleasure product for an affordable price when you purchase the Pure Love Mini bullet.
EASY TO USE - One simple button controls all the pleasure and power you'll need right from your fingertips.
TRAVEL FRIENDLY - Its compact size and travel lock function allow you to bring this little guy with you anywhere without worrying about vibrations turning on at inconvenient times.
MULTI-FUNCTION - Choose from 9 dynamic speeds and patterns that will take you over the edge!
WATERPROOF – With waterproof capability, take this mini bullet with you into the shower or bath and enjoy a whole new experience!
CORDLESS FUN - Enjoy your bullet wherever, whenever thanks to its USB recharging capabilities.
description: The Pure Love Mini bullet vibrator is small in size but packs a powerful punch! This bullet is incredibly strong with 4 speeds and 5 vibrating patterns that start with a deep rumble and rise to an incredible vibration. You are guaranteed maximum vibration when you see the name ‘PowerBullet’, as our one of a kind motors delivers the deepest vibrations that are so powerful, yet so quiet. Not only is it the perfect size for travelling, but it also features a travel-lock function that disables it from randomly turning on in your luggage, so you can travel stress-free. Unlike most bullets, this one is USB rechargeable so you can take it with you anywhere and it will be ready to go.
